text: For what main occasion will you wear this perfume?
Which of these fragrance families attracts you the most?
options: Floral (rose, jasmine, lily of the valley)

text: How intense or light would you prefer the fragrance to be?
Are there any specific fragrance notes that you particularly like or dislike?
options: I prefer citrus and sparkling notes (lemon, bergamot)
I appreciate green and herbaceous notes (cut grass, fig leaves)
I don't like overly musky notes
I love spicy notes (black pepper, cinnamon)

text: Do you have an idea of the budget you would like to allocate to this perfume?
Are you familiar with any particular perfume brands that you like or have already tried?
options: No, I am open to different options
I have only tried niche perfumes
I prefer perfumes from fashion brands
